channel.title: New local problems on FixMyStreet

item.title: Large pothole, 29th August
item.description:
Large pothole in place difficult to avoid going over in car when cars are parked along kerb (as they usually are). Please can you investigate?

item.title: Dead Tree, 29th August
item.description:
I reported this tree is dead in June (25Jun25 report is 7764602 Dead Tree danger? St Edmund’s Terrace) but you have done nothing. Sooner or later the branches are going to start falling off and the tree itself could come down in winds. I am sorry to pester you but there is a real danger of people getting hurt or property getting damage. Thanks, Fiona

Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): 1-3, St Edmund's Terrace, Chalk Farm, City of Westminster
Report on FixMyStreet
